choose.when: SELECT a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName FROM board a, user b WHERE a.user_no = b.no LIMIT #{cpp } OFFSET #{offset }
choose.otherwise: SELECT a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName FROM board a, user b WHERE a.user_no = b.no LIKE '%${keyword }%' ORDER BY g_no desc, o_no asc LIMIT #{cpp } OFFSET #{offset }
